video_description:
This is my review of the Dell streak 7.  I call it the little tablet that could.

mobilechaos.blogspot.com
title: Dell Streak 7 review

comments.text: i have to﻿ choose between the dell streak 7, hp touchpad, the asus Eee pad or the samsung galaxy tab 7"
comments.author: callum1231234

comments.text:
i like the tab because i like the samsung galaxy phone and the dell and the touchpad are cheap but the Eee pad is expensive and i would like a small one cause i travel alot and the 7" sounds good but i like the 10" screen for films 

basically what i want is a tablet that can play hd videos have flash and apps with a good browser good sound and a﻿ capacitive touchscreen and maybe a camera
comments.author: callum1231234

comments.text: Great review...i must decide whether to buy this one, the galaxy 7 or the viewsonic viewpad. Price is the final determination although﻿ i am leaning towards the tegra 2 processor for future honeycomb installation.
comments.author: caddisking

comments.text: So not as loud as my iPad 2?? I was just thinking that the way you can hold it, seeing as it has﻿ speakers on both sides, it might sound better
comments.author: TheIpadFanatic4Life

comments.text: How many HE! He! is he﻿ saying in this video ?
comments.author: EL EL

comments.text: Slooooow down a bit. You sound a little﻿ rushed.
comments.author: Ryan Palmer

comments.text: Thanks for the review, but a couple tips, study what you're talking about first; you said "16gb of memory", it's not. It's 16gb of storage, 512mb of memory. You keep saying 7 inch is too small for honeycomb. no. The screen﻿ size has nothing to do with what os it can run. One last thing. Please refrain from saying "ummm" before every sentence. mkay. thank you.
comments.author: skateractics

comments.text: uuhmm hummm hummmmmmmmm uhmmmm are you in the tibet! with the monks or sumthin auhmmmmmmm  xD aargk argk argk argk nice review﻿ im buying it dude :D uhmm
comments.author: japo1718

comments.text: can you make videos on the dell streak 7 and just straight up upload them to your youtube account ?﻿
comments.author: LifesArt93

comments.text: The Youtube app should be the same as any other device﻿ that has access to Google Play.  I don't have my dell streak anymore to test it out though.
comments.author: Christopher Durham

comments.text: okay and did you like the dell streak 7? from a 1-5 stars how good you think﻿ it was
comments.author: LifesArt93

comments.text: When it first came out I would﻿ have given the device a 4 out of 5 because it was one of the cheaper devices on the market.  But that was when every tablet regardless of size was $500 and the Dell Streak 7 was only $350.  Now, there are far better devices on the market for a lot cheaper.  The Nexus 7 or Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 if you absolutely need a sd card.  Both can be had for less than $250 new.
comments.author: Christopher Durham

comments.text: i have it and i give it a 3 because the first week it shut off on me like when it was almost dead and i had to﻿ restart it but its ok and i got it on a one day sale for 150 so guess not to bad lol
comments.author: LifesArt93

comments.text: A 2 or 3 is a realistic review for the device currently.  Considering you only paid $150, it should get a +1.  I used to have the same problem﻿ with mine when I had it.  It used to get stuck and the only thing I could do was let the battery run down and allow it to reset that way.  I just chalked up the problems to it being one of the first 7" Android devices on the market.
comments.author: Christopher Durham

comments.text: Can u make phone﻿ call using the sim card
comments.author: MrKrystalMania
